Key Match Events: Matthew Wade hit three successive sixes off Shaheen Shah Afridi to end the match
Shaheen Shah Afridi bowled a magnificent opening over of high-speed extreme late in-swing
David Warner was given out despite not hitting the ball after Shadab Khan's delivery
Hasan Ali misjudged the flight of the ball and dropped Matthew Wade at deep midwicket
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan had spent two nights in hospital with a chest infection before the match
Rizwan hit a 52-ball 67 in the match
David Warner cut off in mid-flow against Pakistan but the mojo is back
Australia's run chase got off to a terrible start, with Shaheen bowling a magnificent opening over of high-speed extreme late in-swing
Aaron Finch fell to his first ball of the night
Glenn Maxwell was tempted to kick something when he found out there had been no contact between bat and ball
Hasan Ali's drop of Matthew Wade was crucial as it would have given Pakistan a challenging target
After the match, Matthew Wade praised Marcus Stoinis' batting
